name: Zamberlan Quantum GTX Boots - Children to Youths
description: These rugged boots give kids good support over a variety of terrain. A heel lock is designed to keep the foot stable and prevent shifting or rubbing, and microtex lining in the collar helps control moisture.Uppers are leather with fabric panels and rubber toe bumpers for protection from stubbing.Breathable GORE-TEX® lining helps keep feet dry.Combination metal and webbing eyelet and lace system.Removable EVA footbed provides cushioning and support.Padded and gusseted tongue offers extra comfort and blocks debris.Outsoles have Vibram® cup sole construction for lugged traction on different types of surfaces.
